info.description:
Ok to keep this simple there are a few rules.

1.) No gay stuff. Shrunk men/giant women, you know the drill. I can do Ff, but Mm is out. Nothing against anybody that likes it, it's just not my cup of tea.
2.) Keep it human. Animals=deletion (if she thinks you're a bug, that doesn't count. ;))
3.) No super short chapters. Short chapters are just anticlimactic.
4.) Death is not only ok, it is encouraged, but please allow a life option to keep the story rolling Just make it good.
5.) Toilet stuff is a no go.
6.) I'll allow vore, but this is mostly a crushing story. I want it all.
